ygData.subject: Guys, New server (!), Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: New Server, Guild? Just read the new news text.  A new (non-race war) server is up.  Brell is also designated the alternate role-playing server.  IMHO a
ygData.messageBody:
New Server, Guild?
Just read the new news text. A new (non-race war) server is up. Brell
is also designated the alternate role-playing server. IMHO a woman's
guild on an RP server sounds like a good thing. Is Brell a candidate for
the guild? Does it being designated RP bother anyone? (I *do* RP but am
not a fanatic .. nor do I denigrate those who don't .. a syndrome I refer
to as the holier-than-thou-RP-er complex).

Guild Comments (minor spoiler in this paragraph - but you will get the info
from hailing the right sister in-game).
While I like the Sisters of Erollisi concept ...
- be prepared to PvP, they wear the Purity belts and the Island is a regular
camping/hunting spot for evil races and non-evil money grubbers of mid-
teens and up. I can't see being a sister and not defending one :)
- initial guild meetings should not be on the Isle. The 20 minute wait for
the
boat combined with the 30 minute corpse decay < level 5 could be bad. There
are sharks at the dock .. and they rarely attack through the boat.
But I like the idea :)

Guys & EQ Graphics.
Well, the EQ Graphics are a bit of a family joke in our house. Recently on
the
television, there was a rather (can we say it had to be silicone!) busty
hostess
on a tabloid type talk show that we saw while my husband was "grazing". She
was wearing a "push-up" bra, with a very skimpy mini-skirt shirt-dress which
had front buttons unbuttoned *almost* to her navel, push up cleavage well
displayed.
Bare long legs .... etc ...

My daugher immediately said:
"Hey now SHE belongs in EQ!"

My husband prompty replied:
"Well she's already wearing armor."

Sorry, I couldn't even add a comment I was snickering so hard. And this
comment
from the male!

- Lora
(Wondering how much AC the underwires add)
